title: Gene Ontology Conservation test - Recall
description: Evaluation of orthology in terms of functional similarity using the Gene Ontology Conservation test. Functional similarity is assessed based on experimentally backed annotations from the UniProt-Gene Ontology Annotation (GOA) database. Recall is measured as the number of orthologous relationships predicted by the method.
formal_definition: Recall is measured in terms of the number of orthologous relationships predicted by the method
